name: rspack_webpack
description: Webpack Host with [Rspack](https://rspack.dev) Remotes: App #1 as Webpack, Apps #2-#5 as [Rspack](https://rspack.dev), with coexisting webpack commands.

scripts.start: pnpm --filter rspack_webpack_app* build && pnpm --filter rspack_webpack_app* --parallel serve
scripts.legacy:start: pnpm --filter rspack_webpack_app* legacy:build && pnpm --filter rspack_webpack_app* --parallel serve
scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm exec playwright install --with-deps && pnpm exec playwright test --reporter=list
